articles.description: Ranking well is harder than ever: over 96% of web pages receive zero organic traffic, while the top three results capture more than 54% of all clicks. Understanding modern ranking factors is critical.

articles.title: Google Search Console: 2026 Setup and SEO Wins

articles.title: Google Search Console: Your Complete Guide to GSC in 2026
articles.description: Search Console will tell you about the status of individual pages on your site. There are three main steps: Discovered (Google is aware), Crawled (Google visited), and Indexed (page can appear in search results).

articles.title: Google Algorithm Update: February 2026 Core Update Rolling Out
articles.description: Google has begun rolling out a major core algorithm update affecting search rankings globally. Early data shows significant fluctuations in rankings across multiple industries.

articles.title: Core Web Vitals: New INP Metric Replaces FID
articles.description: Google officially replaces First Input Delay (FID) with Interaction to Next Paint (INP) as a Core Web Vitals metric. Sites need to optimize for faster interactions.
